name: Scaleswap
description: Scaleswap is the next generation IDO launchpad, harnessing the power of Ethereum Layer 2 scaling (powered by Polygon) to provide innovative features and a vastly improved IDO experience for users. We aim to set the new standard in DeFi by making excessive gas fees a thing of the past, and reimagining community appreciation and governance through a comprehensive scoring system that rewards loyalty and participation in 6 different dimensions.
